summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 16596 entitled: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 6th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to Smith Street; West McGraw Street, from 7th Avenue West to 3rd Avenue West; and West Smith Street, from 7th Avenue West to 3rd Avenue West; over and across certain lots, blocks, tracts and parcels of land all in the City of Seattle as public streets and highways, providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged for said purpose and for an assessment upon the property benefited for the purpose of making such compensation."
